response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration and evaluation, I believe we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I am offering you the chance to purchase this unique item for $1,200,000. This price reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also my desire to ensure it finds a home where it can be appreciated fully. I understand its worth to you is $800,000, and I hope this offer presents a favorable proposition. Should you choose to accept, I assure you a seamless transaction with all necessary documentation provided promptly. If you require any additional information or have questions, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
